title: Kamala Harris Rejects "Flip-Flop" Claims: "My Values Have Not Changed"
content: Kamala Harris defended her policy shifts on key issues Thursday, insisting in the first interview of her US presidential campaign that her "values have not changed."
summary: Kamala Harris defended her policy shifts on key issues Thursday, insisting in the first interview of her US presidential campaign that her "values have not changed."

title: "America Will Become Wasteland": Donald Trump Slams Kamala Harris
content: Republican Donald Trump on Friday slammed his rival Kamala Harris after the Democrat gave her first major interview since her dramatic entry into the US presidential election after Joe Biden's exit.
summary: Republican Donald Trump on Friday slammed his rival Kamala Harris after the Democrat gave her first major interview since her dramatic entry into the US presidential election after Joe Biden's exit.

title: 43-Hour Flightime, 32,000 km: 87-Year-Old Pope Francis' Epic Voyage
content: By embarking aged 87 on the farthest journey of his papacy, Pope Francis is doing something some believed impossible -- and seeking to silence those who doubt his ability to fulfil his role.
summary: By embarking aged 87 on the farthest journey of his papacy, Pope Francis is doing something some believed impossible -- and seeking to silence those who doubt his ability to fulfil his role.

title: Trump Accused Of Deserting Anti-Abortion Movement In Battle With Harris
content: Donald Trump has been accused of deserting the anti-abortion movement as he seeks to negate attacks by Kamala Harris over one of the most polarizing issues of the US election.
summary: Donald Trump has been accused of deserting the anti-abortion movement as he seeks to negate attacks by Kamala Harris over one of the most polarizing issues of the US election.

title: $25,000 Bounty On Woman, With Ties To India, Wanted For Son's Murder
content: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) is offering a reward of up to USD 25,000 for information leading to the arrest and conviction of Cindy Rodriguez Singh, wanted for allegedly killing her young son.
summary: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) is offering a reward of up to USD 25,000 for information leading to the arrest and conviction of Cindy Rodriguez Singh, wanted for allegedly killing her young son.

title: "Just Had Pancakes": Kamala Harris On Joe Biden's Call That Made History
content: Kamala Harris on Friday described for the first time US President Joe Biden's phone call informing her he was planning to quit the race to the White House.
summary: Kamala Harris on Friday described for the first time US President Joe Biden's phone call informing her he was planning to quit the race to the White House.

title: US "Ready To Turn The Page" On Donald Trump, Says Kamala Harris
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris said in her first interview of her presidential campaign Thursday that Americans were ready to "turn the page" on divisions she blamed on her rival Donald Trump.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris said in her first interview of her presidential campaign Thursday that Americans were ready to "turn the page" on divisions she blamed on her rival Donald Trump.

title: OpenAI Says ChatGPT's Weekly Users Have Grown To 200 Million
content: AI startup OpenAI said on Thursday its chatbot ChatGPT now has more than 200 million weekly active users, double the number it had in the last fall season.
summary: AI startup OpenAI said on Thursday its chatbot ChatGPT now has more than 200 million weekly active users, double the number it had in the last fall season.

title: How Video Games Turned Nvidia Into A Tech Giant
content: Until quite recently, Nvidia wasn't much of a household name outside of Silicon Valley or Wall Street.
summary: Until quite recently, Nvidia wasn't much of a household name outside of Silicon Valley or Wall Street.

title: Over 60 Million Americans Under Alert As Heatwave Hits US
content: A heat wave brought record-high temperatures to US Midwest states this week, with more than 60 million people included in alerts over the conditions.
summary: A heat wave brought record-high temperatures to US Midwest states this week, with more than 60 million people included in alerts over the conditions.

title: At A Rally In Michigan, Trump Pledges Free IVF For All In Second Term
content: Donald Trump said Thursday he would have the government or insurance companies cover the cost of in-vitro fertilization for "all Americans who need it" in a second term -- although he declined to say how he would pay for it.
summary: Donald Trump said Thursday he would have the government or insurance companies cover the cost of in-vitro fertilization for "all Americans who need it" in a second term -- although he declined to say how he would pay for it.

title: Powerful Typhoon Shanshan Slams Japan, Multiple Deaths Reported
content: One of Japan's strongest typhoons in decades dumped torrential rain across southern regions on Thursday, leaving at least five people dead and injuring dozens, local media reported.
summary: One of Japan's strongest typhoons in decades dumped torrential rain across southern regions on Thursday, leaving at least five people dead and injuring dozens, local media reported.

title: "Fight Is For America's Future": Kamala Harris At Georgia Rally
content: Democratic presidential nominee and Vice President Kamala Harris on Thursday emphasised that the current presidential fight is for the future of the United States and asserted that the future is always worth fighting for.
summary: Democratic presidential nominee and Vice President Kamala Harris on Thursday emphasised that the current presidential fight is for the future of the United States and asserted that the future is always worth fighting for.

title: Lawsuit Claiming Elon Musk, Tesla Rigged Dogecoin Dismissed
content: Elon Musk and his electric vehicle company Tesla won the dismissal of a federal lawsuit accusing them of defrauding investors by hyping the cryptocurrency dogecoin and conducting insider trading, causing billions of dollars of losses.
summary: Elon Musk and his electric vehicle company Tesla won the dismissal of a federal lawsuit accusing them of defrauding investors by hyping the cryptocurrency dogecoin and conducting insider trading, causing billions of dollars of losses.

title: Explained: How AI Is Leading Israel's Bombing Campaign In Gaza
content: Israel's military campaign in Gaza - which started after the deadly October 7 last year in which over 1,100 people were brutally killed - has entered its 10th month and over 40,000 people have died.
summary: Israel's military campaign in Gaza - which started after the deadly October 7 last year in which over 1,100 people were brutally killed - has entered its 10th month and over 40,000 people have died.

title: ChatGPT's Weekly Users Have Grown To 200 Million, Says OpenAI
content: AI startup OpenAI said on Thursday its chatbot ChatGPT now has more than 200 million weekly active users, double the number it had in the last fall season.
summary: AI startup OpenAI said on Thursday its chatbot ChatGPT now has more than 200 million weekly active users, double the number it had in the last fall season.

title: Macron Says He Was Not Aware Of Telegram Chief Durov's Arrival In France
content: French President Emmanuel Macron was not aware of Telegram owner Pavel Durov's arrival in France on Saturday and had not been scheduled to meet him, he told a news conference on Thursday during a two-day visit in Serbia.
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron was not aware of Telegram owner Pavel Durov's arrival in France on Saturday and had not been scheduled to meet him, he told a news conference on Thursday during a two-day visit in Serbia.

title: Social Media Platform X Down For Thousands Of Users: Reportc
content: Social media platform X suffered outages on Thursday afternoon, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.
summary: Social media platform X suffered outages on Thursday afternoon, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.

title: Two Days Of Israeli Raids Kill At Least 16 Palestinians In West Bank
content: Israel on Thursday pressed a large-scale military operation in the occupied West Bank that killed at least 16 Palestinians in two days, despite UN concerns it was "fuelling an already explosive situation".
summary: Israel on Thursday pressed a large-scale military operation in the occupied West Bank that killed at least 16 Palestinians in two days, despite UN concerns it was "fuelling an already explosive situation".

title: Reality TV Show To Send Indian To Space With Jeff Bezos's Blue Origin
content: TV show producer Banijay Asia has tied up with Space Exploration and Research Agency for a reality show to send an Indian into space on a future Blue Origin New Shepard mission.
summary: TV show producer Banijay Asia has tied up with Space Exploration and Research Agency for a reality show to send an Indian into space on a future Blue Origin New Shepard mission.
